statements: SELECT * FROM Microfinance_Loans WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT loan_amount, entrepreneur_name FROM Microfinance_Loans ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_loans FROM Microfinance_Loans WHERE success_evaluation = 'Good';
SELECT entrepreneur_name, loan_amount FROM Microfinance_Loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT country, success_evaluation FROM Microfinance_Loans WHERE success_evaluation LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY entrepreneur_name ASC;
SELECT entrepreneur_name, country, loan_amount FROM Microfinance_Loans WHERE success_evaluation = 'Excellent' ORDER BY loan_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Microfinance_Loans WHERE country = 'India' AND loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_id
SELECT entrepreneur_name, success_evaluation, loan_amount FROM Microfinance_Loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY entrepreneur_name ASC
SELECT loan_id, entrepreneur_name, country FROM Microfinance_Loans WHERE loan_amount < 1000 AND country IN ('Kenya', 'Nigeria')
SELECT * FROM Microfinance_Loans WHERE success_evaluation LIKE '%Good%' ORDER BY country, entrepreneur_name DESC
SELECT * FROM microfinance_loans;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM microfinance_loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT borrower_id, loan_amount FROM microfinance_loans ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT impact_description, empowerment_score FROM impact_evaluation WHERE empowerment_score >= 0.75;
SELECT * FROM microfinance_loans JOIN impact_evaluation ON microfinance_loans.loan_id = impact_evaluation.loan_id;
SELECT * FROM microfinance_loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT loan_id, borrower_id, loan_amount FROM microfinance_loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;

SELECT m.loan_id, m.loan_amount, i.empowerment_score, i.impact_description FROM microfinance_loans m INNER JOIN impact_evaluation i ON m.loan_id = i.loan_id WHERE i.empowerment_score >= 0.8 ORDER BY m.loan_amount ASC;
SELECT m.*, i.empowerment_score FROM microfinance_loans m LEFT JOIN impact_evaluation i ON m.loan_id = i.loan_id WHERE i.impact_description LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY m.loan_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT borrower_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM microfinance_loans GROUP BY borrower_id HAVING total_loan_amount > 10000 ORDER BY total_loan_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM women_entrepreneurs;
SELECT name, age, location FROM women_entrepreneurs WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, loan_amount, loan_date FROM women_entrepreneurs WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM loan_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT name, impact_rating, feedback FROM women_entrepreneurs INNER JOIN impact_evaluation ON women_entrepreneurs.id = impact_evaluation.loan_id;
SELECT * FROM women_entrepreneurs ORDER BY name ASC, age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, age, location FROM women_entrepreneurs WHERE age > 30 AND loan_amount > 5000 ORDER BY loan_date DESC;

SELECT w.name, l.payment_amount, i.impact_rating FROM women_entrepreneurs w INNER JOIN loan_payments l ON w.id = l.loan_id INNER JOIN impact_evaluation i ON w.id = i.loan_id WHERE l.payment_amount > 1000 AND i.impact_rating > 3 ORDER BY w.name ASC, l.payment_date DESC;

SELECT w.name, w.location, l.payment_amount, i.impact_rating FROM women_entrepreneurs w LEFT JOIN loan_payments l ON w.id = l.loan_id LEFT JOIN impact_evaluation i ON w.id = i.loan_id WHERE l.payment_amount >= 2000 OR i.impact_rating >= 4 ORDER BY w.name ASC, l.payment_amount DESC;

SELECT w.name, l.payment_amount, i.feedback FROM women_entrepreneurs w LEFT JOIN loan_payments l ON w.id = l.loan_id LEFT JOIN impact_evaluation i ON w.id = i.loan_id WHERE l.payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND i.feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY w.name ASC, l.payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans ORDER BY loan_date DESC, loan_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount FROM loans WHERE borrower_id = 5;
SELECT name, sector, revenue FROM businesses WHERE revenue > 50000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT borrower_id, name, age FROM borrowers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT impact_metric, evaluation_date FROM impact_evaluation WHERE borrower_id = 3 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 5000 AND borrower_id IN (SELECT borrower_id FROM borrowers WHERE country = 'USA')
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loans WHERE borrower_id = 3 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC
SELECT borrowers.name, borrowers.gender, businesses.name, businesses.sector FROM borrowers INNER JOIN businesses ON borrowers.borrower_id = businesses.borrower_id
SELECT AVG(impact_score) AS average_score FROM loans WHERE loan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT impact_metric FROM impact_evaluation WHERE borrower_id = 5 AND evaluation_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT borrower_id, age, occupation FROM borrowers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, loan_date FROM loans ORDER BY loan_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM impact_metrics WHERE impact_score >= 0.8;
SELECT country_name, region FROM countries WHERE development_level = 'Developed';
SELECT * FROM loans ORDER BY loan_amount DESC, loan_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT borrower_id, occupation, income FROM borrowers WHERE age > 30 AND gender='Male';
SELECT country_name, region FROM countries WHERE development_level='Developing';
SELECT loan_id, loan_amount, borrower_id FROM loans INNER JOIN borrowers ON loans.borrower_id = borrowers.borrower_id;
SELECT metric_name, impact_score FROM impact_metrics WHERE impact_score > 0.8 ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
